info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:43PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN HARDING AND SOUTHEASTERN MORA COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM MDT... At 442 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Wagon Mound, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wagon Mound. This includes Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 380 and 391. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northeastern New Mexico.
